fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
head_office_address: Avenue de la Joyeuse Entrée 1 Boîte 11
inter_groups: Biodiversity, countryside, hunting and recreational fischeries.
eu_initiatives:
- Monitoring and providing information on European politics and legislations 
- Organisation of events and seminaries on European legislation, implicating the euro-deputies and advisors of the European Commission 
- Presentation of the position of important Italian enterprises on European legislative proposals 
- Assistance and participation to the parliamentary sessions ins Brussels as well as in Strasbourg

- European Defence Strategy 
- Industrial Policy 
- New Antidumping Methodology 
- "Clean Energy for all" package 
- Digital Single Market

persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: DELL'ORCO#Francesca, FAMA'#Rosalba, MALVESTITI CLAP#Michele, MARINO#Aldo, RISTUCCIA#Chiara, RUGGERI#Gianluca, SEBASTIANI#Giuliana, SPANGARO#Michele
membership: Direct cooperation with the Delegation of Confindustria, the Confederation of Italian Industries, active in Brussels since 1958, which overall objective is to defend and promote the interests of Italian enterprises.
goals__remit: Provide support services to Italian industrial organisations and companies that are members, even indirectly, to Confindustria, the Italian Business Association, which is his main shareholder and represents the Italian Industry.
relevant_communication: Organisation of events and seminaries on European legislation, implicating the euro-deputies and advisors of the European Commission
